name: Field
description:
An arcade game (very loosely) inspired by quantum field theory.

You control the white particle, and need to dodge the red antimatter particles while staying on the field. The field responds to your movements - it oscillates and ripples in response to your motions. The more the field is agitated, the faster the score racks up - and the faster the red particles are spawned. And beware: the shape of the field itself distorts the path of the particles. Use it well, and it can be a weapon - miscalculate, and it could lead to an early annihilation...

Controls:

Move the particle with your mouse

ESC to quit

Click to restart after losing
